page.title: 16BUSINESS FAIRLIGHT, E.SUSSEX
page.content:
Each of the three village centres Fairlight, Guestling, Pett in East Sussex have small general stores to provide groceries, toiletries and hardware for the villagers. Many people travel to Hastings for their weekly supply of groceries. For clothes, furniture, electrical goods, etc. all villagers have to go to Hastings or Rye, or further.
There are a few small businesses here. There is one firm of building decorators and funeral directors. A bricklayer, and a painter and decorator can also be found in this area. There are two small businesses not directly connected with serving the needs of the villagers. These are a lubricating equipment manufacturer and a firm making moulds for glassfibre reinforced plastics.
